description: Complete system overview documenting the extension's architecture, key components, and high-level functionality including content analysis, navigation detection, and UI management
Detailed documentation of the core navigation detection algorithms including pattern recognition, scoring system, filtering mechanisms, and element analysis logic
Comprehensive documentation of browser UI filtering algorithms including position-based exclusions, selector-based filtering, and size constraints implementation
Documentation of data flow between extension components including popup interface, content scripts, and message passing mechanisms
